comments.content: Can't recognize it and actually doubting it could be a font, more likely a custom lettering, which actually makes sense when we know we're talking about Harley Davidson. 2 you might like as substitute: [Speedway A&S](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014151156/http:/artandsignstudio.com/speedway.html), [Ragged Brad LHF](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014151156/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/fonts/raggedbrad.php)
Thank for your quick reply Ryuk, after browsing through my font library I´ve now decided on using LHF Sarah Script

Sarah Script is nice choice. Adding [Snapper Script A&S](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014151156/http:/artandsignstudio.com/snapper.html) to my previous suggestions, probably the closest you could get.
